full_summary:
### Tender Announcement

Tender Reference: WS4304230829

** Solicitation Title **

* English: W0142-24X008 Ford Parts, Repair and Service
* French: W0142-24X008 Pièces, entretien et réparation pour véhicules Ford

** Tender Details **

* Amendment Number: 2
* Publication Date: 2023-12-20
* Tender Closing Date and Time: 2024-01-12, 2:00 PM EST
* Amendment Date: 2024-01-09
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-02-09
* Expected Contract End Date: 2026-12-31
* UNSPSC Code: 78181500 (Vehicle Maintenance and Repair Services)
* Trade Agreements: Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Region of Operation: None
* Region of Delivery: Alberta
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

** Tender Requirements **

* Notice Type: Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding (Non-Limited)
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Tender Description: The Department of National Defence requires Ford Parts, Repairs and Service on an as-needed basis to support the mobile support fleet holdings at CFB Suffield. The successful bidder must provide warranty service, inspections, regular/routine service intervals, various mechanical repairs, and OEM parts for in-house repairs.

** Contact Information **

* Contact Name: Wiebe, Lyland (SPAC/PSPC)
* Contact Email: lyland.wiebe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

** Tender Documents **

* Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18332693?extsite=MTgzMzI2OTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg== Please ensure that all required supporting documentation and bid submission is submitted by 2024-01
